page.title: 05Mixed livestock farm
page.content: Mr.Greatorex is a livestock farmer.He has 40 Friesian cows and 25 calves together with 55 Clun Forest sheep and 82 lambs.He milks the cows every day getting an average of{450}litres.He has 135 acres which covers nearly all of Oaker Hill and part of Wensley Dale.It is mainly used for grazing,but some of it is used for crops.There is some machinery on the farm,one tedder,two trailers,a tractor,a plough and a muck-speader.The tractor and muck-spreader can often be seen going up the road from Darley Bridge.
